div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem x die
Junij anno quo Supra

The saide day Comperit Alane litstar with Alexander menyes and
Dauid menyes his forspekaris and complenyet that Robert of Crag
hed' strubulit him in word and the said Robert with mastir Androw
byssat his forspekar' and tuk to preyve al actionis debatable'
betuix the said' Alane and Robert at summission' hinc inde and
he askit ane terme to preyve his allegeance And the aldirman
and balyeis with avys' of the Court assignit friday that next cumis
to the said' Robert and his forspekar to preyve thar' said' allegeance

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
Junij anno quo Supra

The saide day the haill tone grantit to pas' tham self to
the kepin of the portis of this tone ay quhen thai happin to
fall about or ellis Sett Sufficient mene to the kepin
of the said' portis for the quhilkis the personis that send' tham thar
Sal stand' for and vndirlie thar' doingis in the keping' of
the said' portis vndir the panys of banyson' of the burghe
for yer' and day And that nayne kepand' the said portis
tak money or Revarde fra ony persone entirand' and that
nay persone outduellar' cum in at ony bak yet or vthir
place than the portis vndir the pane of bannyson' out of the tone

The saide day Robert blinsele Alexander rede Jonhne Colison'
gilbert menyeis Robert Crag Williame futhes george
bysset Androw murray eldar' Duncan Colisone Jonhne
blak Williame gareauche Jonhne retre Richerd Waus
patrik chernsid' Dauid adamson' and William portar' burges
and merchandis of abirdene Circualie Inquerit be Androw
Elphinstone of Salmys and mastir Androw byssat chamerlan
to my lord of abirdene In the name of his lordschipe grantit
thame wele content and pait of al finance and Somes of
money aucht to tham be the said' lord and dischargis his lordschip
tharof for tham thar ayris executoris now and foreuire And in lik uys'
the said Androw and mastir Androw in the name of the said lorde
quiet'clamit and dischargit the said merchandice thar ayris executoris ande
assignez now and foreuire And' thomas prat in likuys' dischargit
the said lord and was dischargit befor thir witnes Alexander menyeis
David menyes William blinsell mastir Johne badenaghe mastir William
strathachin

The saide day thome of buchan baxtar grantit and oblist him to deliuer
to Jonhne chapman j gold ring within viij dais quhilk he had'
of his

The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman
and balyeis consal that Robert of crag and Alane litstar sal stand'
in ayfald' tendirnes and kindnes in tym' to Cum as efferis
tendir nychtbouris Ande gif ony ane of tham offendis to vthiris
and beis conuikit tharof sal pay tene li' to Sanct nicholes
werk and j twne of wyn' to the king' vnforgevin with
consent of bath the said partiis the beand' oblist tharto be thar
handis

The saide day Thome gardane was in amerciament of the
Court be his avme tonge grant for the wrangwis' strublance
of Jonet oge the wif of thome logy skynner and tile amend'
as law will and forber' in tyme tocum Ande atour it was
deliuerit and ordanit be ane suorne assis' Cristy prat
forspekar that gif euire the Thome committit ony strublance
to the saide Jonet or ony vtheris withtin this burght and
beis conuikit tharof that he salbe banyst the town'

The saide day Alexander myrtone Come law souerte
for thome gardyne be his hande vphaldin that Thome logy
skynner and Jonet oge his wif suld be vnskathit of the said
Thome vthirwais thane law wald Ande the saidez thome
logy and Jonet fande Johne Retre law souerte for thame that
the said' Thome gardin suld' be vnskathit of thame vthirwais
thane law wald' and Ilkan of the saide partiis oblist thame be thar
handis vphaldin to fre thar borrowis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die
Junij anno quo Supra

The saide day It was statut ordanit ande finalie concludit be
the aldirman balyeis Consale ande Communite of this burghe opinlie
warnit be the hande bell and officiaris throw the haill tone that nay manere
of persone wittalis nor vthir stuf beyonde and one the southt part of
the wattir of Dee Cum within this burghe without Sufficient Certificacion
that thai ar' clene and Cumin fra clene placis Item that nay persone off nay
degre bevne sanct ternanys monymusk Srabogy' nor northt
part wart fra ald' Abirdene cum within this burghe and that the said personis
Cum nocht within the tone withoutin Sufficient Certificacion that thai ar' cumin
fra clen' placis and that thai ar' clene Item that xxiiij personis Circualy
Requerit and warnit personaly pas' ilkan nycht to the waching' of
the tone and that ilke man pas' for him self vndir the panys' of
bannysing And that nane Induellar' of this towne pas' vteuche
to faris Ande that nay tymmir' Cum within the tone And that nane
leip dikis portis nor Cum In atour ony vthir' place the portis
vndir the pane of bannysin the tone and quhay findis ony persone
lepand' ony port or bak dik and schevis to the aldirman the
name of the persone he sal haue v s' to his Revarde
and that nay tymmir' cum within this burghe

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die
Junij quo Supra

the saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman
balyeis and consale that Agnes mathousone douchtir
to vmquhill Dauid mathesone aw to haue the haill
ayrschip of hir' saide fadir becaus' scho was fundin
nerrast and lauchfule ayr to vmquhil hir' saide fadir
be ane Inquest of the court obefor Ande atour the gift
of the best of ale the saide Dauidis gudis gevin and
grantit be ane pretendit gift be the said vmquhill
Dauid in preiudice of his lauchfule ayr' vndir Instrument
be sere Jonhne Stirueling subscriuit and selit with the
seile of thomas fyf to Wille mathesone Richerde
mathesone and Wate matheson' was fundin be nane of
availl be the haill consall and Court

add.foreign: Robertus blinsele et filie olim Walterj blinsell

div.p:
The saide day Cristiane blinsel margaret blinsel and Elizibeth' blinsele douchteris
to vmquhil Wat blinsel with consent and assent of Androw lousone and mathow
Wricht spous' to the said cristiane and was oblist and suorne the gret
aithis to stand and Abid' at the ordinance and finale deliuerance of Robert blinsele
and mastir Johne badenaghe thar tendirast emys anent the land' liand' in the
gastraw follouit be tham throw deces' of thar said' fadir

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die mensis Junij quo
Supra

div.head:
Inquisicio Johannis Richerdson' filij patruj
fratris Willelmi fyve
div.p:
Andreas murray senior Willelmus portar' Robertus crag Willelmus gareauche Dauid
murray Thomas chapman Willelmus Kyntor patricius Rede Dauid fynne
Johannes talyour' arthour' Johannes low Andreas Stevinsone henricus gareauche Andreas
meldrum et Andreas scrogis Jurati dicunt quod Johannes Richerdson' est legittimus et
propinquior heres quondam Willelmj fyve patruj suj Et quod est legittime etatis et
quod non sunt terre neque annuj Redditus

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
mensis Junij quo Supra

add.foreign: Andreas litstar Johannes Colison' pro J grig

div.p:
The saide day Comperit Androw litstar with mastir Androw Crawfurd'
his forspekar ande producit and Schew ane Certificacion vndir the seile
of mydilburghe anent the Richt of ane pip of wad sauld' to the
said Androw and arrestit at the challance of Jonhne grig quhilkis
Certificacion beand' Rede herde and vndirstandin the said mastir Androw
forspekar to the said androw askit the said pip of wade be lousit
and frede of all arrestment becaus' he had schevin ane sufficient
Certificacion that the said pip of wad was the said Androwis propir
gudis the partiis batht forsaid beand' removit the Court Riplie obefor
decretit and fand the said Certificacion of vaill and ordanit the arrest
of the samyn to be lousit and thomas leslie balye to ger' deliuer it to
the said Androu litstar Apon' the quhilkis the said mastir Androw askit at
me sere Johne Stirueling notar Instrument and akis witnes sere Johne ruthirfurd'
aldirman Robert blinsel Jonhne of Cullane Thomas prat Dauid menyes
gilbert menyes thomas Waus Johne mar' mastir Jhone badenaghe' philp
Dunbrek and Jonhne Williamsone dempstar of the Court

The vj day of Julij the yer forsaid' the haill tone warnit be
the hand'bell and be the officiaris present for the tyme representand' the
body of the tone consentit and ordanit that Wat blaklok and Dauid Retre
suld' haue enteres' in ane hous' and thar to Reman certan tyme vnto It
war' undirstandyng that thai war' Cumyn' fra clene placis and ar'
clene of all Infirmites

head.add: Copia commissionis Alexandri Rede et Sponse sue

div.p:
Vniuersis ad quorum Noticiam presentes littere peruenerint burgenses et communitas burgi de
abirdene eternam in domino salutem Noueritis nos matura auisacione prehabita vtilitate
nostra in hac parte debite preuisa et diligenter considerata et notant' pro proponiacione
Illustri principi ac domino Comiti de mar' facienda fecisse constituisse
et ordinasse necnon tenore presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros comburgenses
predictos Johannem ruthirfurd' militem tunc prepositum nostrum alexandrum menyes Robertum blinsele Johannem
Cullan David menyes Johannem colison' et thomam prat nostros legittimos et indubitatos
commissarios actores factores et deputatos speciales dan' et conceden' eisdem
nostram plenam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro nobis et nomine nostro omnes et singulas
piscarias nostras dimidii Rethis aque boreali de Done assedare et ad firmam dimittere
Inmediate post complementum et terminum istius generalis assedacionis nostre Instan' honorabili viro alexandro rede
nostro comburgense et mariorie Cullan sponse sue eorumque alteri diucius vmen' pro
terminis quinque annorum et vlterius si nostra generali assedacio perficiend' longiores terminos
proportauerit quibus nunc dictus alexander gaudit et in assedacione habet quorum quidem alexandri et
mariorie aut eorum diucius vmen' heredum suorum aut assignat Introitus ad
huiusmodi piscarias in vigilia sancti Andree apostoli anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Et
generaliter omnia alia et Singula faciend' gerend' et excercend' in premissis et circa ea
que necessaria fuerint seu oportuna promitten' nos Ratum gratum firmum et stabilum
haben' et habiturum totum et quicquid dicti commissarij nostri in premissis dixerint faciend'
sub ypotheca et obligacione onmium bonorum nostrorum mobilium et immobilium presencium et futurorum
In cuius Rei testimonium presentibus sigillum nostrum communione est appensum apud abirdene viij die
mensis Julij anno Domino Mo ccccmo nonagesimo nono

add.foreign: Copia assedacionis alexandri Rede et sponse sue

div.p:
Be it kend tile al mene be thir present letteres vs aldirman balyes consal and
communite of abirdene our avale in that part seyne considerit and undirstandin to haue set and
to maile lattyn and be thir present letteres settis and to male lattis tile our trast
nichbour alexander rede and to mariory Cullan his spous' and to the langast lyvar'
of tham tua al and hale the fischingis of ane half nethis of Done for al the
termes of fyve yeris Inmediatlie to be Runnyn eftir the vsche and ende of
this our generale assedacion Instant and langir gif our generale assedacion
to be maid' happinnis to be set for langar termes for als' lang termes
as it sal proport for ane certan some vsual money of scotlande pait
to vs in novmerit money for the grissome of the samyn tile ane propin to
my lord' of mar' in tym of the makin' of thir lettres To be haldin and hed al
and hall the saide half nethis fischingis with the pertinentis to the said alexander mariorie
his spous' and to the langarast lyvar' of tham tua thar ayris and assignez' nay
gretar than tham self with al and sindrie fredomes commoditeis asiamantis and profitis
pertening or may pertene tharto quhilk demi nethis fischingis the said alexander
has now in assedacion of vs to the vigil of Sanct Androw the appostle
In the yer of god jm and fiwe hundreth yeris The entre of the said alexander and
mariorie the langast lyvar' of tham tua thar ayris or assignez' salbe in and with
the said demi nethis fischingis with the pertinencis at the said vigile of Sanct Androw and
frathinfurth to Joys' and bruk the samyn peciable' quhil al the termes of
fyve yeris and langar gif the next our general assedacion to be mad happinis
to be set for Inmediatlie be fullely complet and runnyn but ony Inpediment
obstacil' or demavnd to be maid' in the contrar' the said alexander and mariory his spous'
the langast lyvar' of tham tua thar ayris or assignez' payand' yerlie to vs or
our' Successoris' aucht li' vsual money of scotland of maile at the termes
vsual within the said burghe alanerlie for ale thingis that may be askit or Requirit
tharof Induring the said termes And' we the saidez aldirman balyeis consal and
communite of abirdene oblis' vs and our Successoris to varand keip and defend' al and hal
the said demi nethis fischingis with the pertinencis to the saidez alexander and mariory his spous'
and to the langast lyvar' of tham tua thar ayris and assignais nay gretar than tham
self for al the termes of fyve yeris and langar gif our said next generale
assedacion happinnis to be set for in maner and forme as said is be al our
gudis present and to Cum aganis al dedlie al fraude and gile avay put In
witnesing of the quhilkis our common sele is appensit to thir lettres at Abirdene
the viij day of Julij the yer' of god jM iiijC nyntj and nyne yeris

The xij day of Julij the yer forsaide the aldirman ande
balyeis ordanit and chargit Richard Waus yongar to pay
his maile bigane tile Elizibeth setone safar' as he is
avand' to hir' and chargit hir' to mend' his hous' and mak
It Sufficient quhilkis scho grantit to do within xx dais
Ande gif scho falyet and gert nocht mend' the said hous' the
aldirman and balyeis ordanit the said Richerd to ger' mend'
the said hous' as efferis and ger' tua Craftismen' be suorne
and consider the expens' that he makis quhilkis salbe allouit
in his martymes maile to Cum ande the said Richard has
pait the Witsonday maill bigane to the said' elizibeth at
commavnd' of the aldirman and balyes

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
Julij quo Supra

The saide day comperit Jonhne thomsone and producit ane
Instrument of the assignacion and set of ane lande liand' in the
vuirkirkgat be anny atkin and askit the samyn to be Rede
and Williame Walcar' allegit that he had tak of the said'
land and the aldirman and balyeis friday that next Cumis to schew
his tak and preiwe it befor tham and falyeing tharof to Rede the
said' land' to the saide Jonhne

The saide day Robert Rudman in Kingorne oblist him be
his hande landis and gudis to bring ane boyt with lyme agan
to this burghe in al possible' hast to pay the prouincial' of the
predicatoris it that is avand' to him and to ale vthiris and gif he
falyeis he assignit his wyfis coniunctfeftment of the land' liand'
in the Castalgat to the said prouincial' quhile he be pait

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit philp Dunbrek
tollar' to pay the prouincial' priour' and conuent of the predicatoris the xxvj
merkis avand to thame of this yer'

The saide day Robert blinsel Come souerte to entir gilbert
of Ketht befor the aldirman and balyeis within this burghe one
the fest of the assumption of our lady next to Cum

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie
quod magister Andreas patirsone est legittimus et propinquior heres
quondam Dauid patirsone patris suj burgensis huius burgi

The saide day Jonhne andirson talyour grantit him
avand' to Robert rudman Induellar' of Kingorne
xl s' quhilkis the balyes Chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The saide day Duncan baxtar tuk him to preiwe that
part of the gratht that was takin out of his nethis
is in Androw thom branchis nethis and the aldirman and balyeis assignit
him friday that next Cumis to his preyve

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Jonhne of Cullan forspekar that Jonhne nicholsone and his fallowis
botismen and quhit fischearis sal serue thomas prat in his bayt
quhill michaelmes next to Cum eftir the tenor of the condicion
writin in the saide thomas Covnt buk

The said' day henry Rodis franchman grantit him aving to William
chamer tua barrellis of flour' for money Ande he fand' Johne schevall
dettour' to the said' William for the pament of the said' ij barrelis flour' to be
payt at his next Agancumin in Abirdene one the said' Williammis aventour'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
Julij anno Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais
the secunde day of august to Jonhne blak to ansuer' to William
futhes anent the clame of j pip of wad'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Colison' forspekar that hay de Rodis franchman in Dep sal pay
to Johne Schevall xv frankis viij s' for ilkan frank
for fraucht of ar se certan gudis et cetera

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was
gevin for dome that Duncan baxtar had falyet in his preiwe
as day assignit to him to preiw that part of the gratht that was
in his nethis was in mathow branchis nethis and the saide
mathow quyt of his challance

The saide day Androw Cullane eldar balye gaf in his
Covnt of this money In presens Resavit fra alexander Rede iij li' iij s'
and iiij d' of the girssome of his demi nethis of Done Item resavit fra
Robert blinsell x s' Item fra Dauid menyes x s' Item fra Jonhne
of Cullane x s' Item fra Johne of Knollis x s' and fra thomas
prat x s' of thar girssomes' of thar takis of thar demi nethis of the
Raik and gevin ij s' to the said' Robert blinsell ij s' of the Rest
of viij boystis of skorcheatis quhilkis Somes of money
was spendit and exponit In wyne Spisary and wax
gevin in ane propyne to my lord' of mar'

The saide day the action' debatable' betuix Jonhne thomsone and
William Walcar' anent the debat of the tak of ane land is continevit
til the decision' of ane assis' to monunday the xxix day of
Julij
